Platform.Title: ecoli_12
Platform.Manufacturer: Catherine,,Ball; Stanford University School of Medicine, Department of Genetics, CCSR Room 2255b, Stanford, CA, USA, 94305; 650-498-6012; ball@genome.stanford.edu
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: Material is transferred from microtiter plate wells to the slide surface by an automated print head

Platform.Title: ECD3
Platform.Manufacturer: John,,Matese; Lewis-Sigler Institute for Integrative Genomics, Carl Icahn Laboratory, Room 135, Princeton, NJ, United States; (609) 258-8309; jcmatese@genomics.princeton.edu
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: Material is transferred from microtiter plate wells to the slide surface by an automated print head

Sample.Title: ecd3-c-0081429 wt vs dpiAoverexpressor
Sample.Description: Simple annotation: Mutants, Gene overexpression Image: http://smd.stanford.edu/MicroArray/gifs/2002-12/36051.gif
Sample.Data-Processing: VALUE is Log (base 2) of the ratio of the median of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm)

Column.Name: ID_REF
Column.Description: ID_REF

Column.Name: CH1I_MEAN
Column.Description: Mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2I_MEAN
Column.Description: Mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1B_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature background intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel; Background

Column.Name: CH2B_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature background intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel; Background

Column.Name: CH1D_MEAN
Column.Description: The mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel

Column.Name: CH2D_MEAN
Column.Description: .The mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: CH1I_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2I_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1B_MEAN
Column.Description: The mean feature background intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Background

Column.Name: CH2B_MEAN
Column.Description: The mean feature background intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Background

Column.Name: CH1D_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2D_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1_PER_SAT
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels at wavelength 532 nm that are saturated.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2_PER_SAT
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels at wavelength 635 nm that are saturated.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1I_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel

Column.Name: CH2I_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: CH1B_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature background intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel; Background

Column.Name: CH2B_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature background intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel; Background

Column.Name: PERGTBCH1I_1SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than one standard deviation above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PERGTBCH2I_1SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than one standard deviation above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PERGTBCH1I_2SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than two standard deviations above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PERGTBCH2I_2SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than two standard deviations above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: SUM_MEAN
Column.Description: The sum of the arithmetic mean intensities for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: SUM_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The sum of the median intensities for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT1_MEAN
Column.Description: Ratio of the arithmetic mean intensities of each spot for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted. Channel 1/Channel 2 ratio, (CH1I_MEAN - CH1B_MEDIAN)/(CH2I_MEAN - CH2B_MEDIAN) or Green/Red ratio.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2_MEAN
Column.Description: The ratio of the arithmetic mean intensities of each feature for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The ratio of the median intensities of each feature for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PIX_RAT2_MEAN
Column.Description: The geometric mean of the pixel-by-pixel ratios of pixel intensities, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PIX_RAT2_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median of pixel-by-pixel ratios of pixel intensities, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2_SD
Column.Description: The geometric standard deviation of the pixel intensity ratios.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: TOT_SPIX
Column.Description: The total number of feature pixels.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: TOT_BPIX
Column.Description: The total number of background pixels.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: REGR
Column.Description: The regression ratio of every pixel in a 2-feature-diameter circle around the center of the feature.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CORR
Column.Description: The correlation between channel1 (Cy3) & Channel 2 (Cy5) pixels within the spot, and is a useful quality control parameter. Generally, high values imply better fit & good spot quality.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: DIAMETER
Column.Description: The diameter in um of the feature-indicator.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: X_COORD
Column.Description: X-coordinate of the center of the spot-indicator associated with the spot, where (0,0) is the top left of the image.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: Y_COORD
Column.Description: Y-coordinate of the center of the spot-indicator associated with the spot, where (0,0) is the top left of the image.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: TOP
Column.Description: Box top: int(((centerX - radius) - Xoffset) / pixelSize).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: BOT
Column.Description: Box bottom: int(((centerX + radius) - Xoffset) / pixelSize).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: LEFT
Column.Description: Box left: int(((centerY - radius) - yoffset) / pixelSize).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RIGHT
Column.Description: Box right: int(((centerY + radius) - yoffset) / pixelSize); Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: FLAG
Column.Description: The type of flag associated with a feature: -100 = user-flagged null spot; -50 = software-flagged null spot; 0 = spot valid.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2IN_MEAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of mean Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity (CH2I_MEAN/Normalization factor).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: CH2BN_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of median Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) background (CH2B_MEDIAN/Normalization factor).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel; Background

Column.Name: CH2DN_MEAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of mean Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity with normalized background subtracted (CH2IN_MEAN - CH2BN_MEDIAN).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: RAT2N_MEAN
Column.Description: Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2IN_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of median Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity (CH2I_MEDIAN/Normalization factor).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2DN_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of median Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity with normalized background subtracted (CH2IN_MEDIAN - CH2BN_MEDIAN).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT1N_MEAN
Column.Description: Ratio of the means of Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) intensity to normalized Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity with median background subtracted (CH1D_MEAN/CH2DN_MEAN). Channel 1/Channel 2 ratio normalized or Green/Red ratio normalized.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2N_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Channel 2/Channel 1 ratio normalized, RAT2_MEDIAN/Normalization factor or Red/Green median ratio normalized.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: LOG_RAT2N_MEAN
Column.Description: Log (base 2) of the ratio of the mean of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) [log (base 2) (RAT2N_MEAN)].; Type: float; Scale: log_base_2

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Log (base 2) of the ratio of the median of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) [log (base 2) (RAT2N_MEDIAN)].; Type: float; Scale: log_base_2

Column.Description: Log (base 2) of the ratio of the mean of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) [log (base 2) (RAT2N_MEAN)].; Type: float; Scale: log_base_2

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Log (base 2) of the ratio of the median of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) [log (base 2) (RAT2N_MEDIAN)].; Type: float; Scale: log_base_2

Column.Name: CH1I_MEAN
Column.Description: Mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2I_MEAN
Column.Description: Mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1B_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature background intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel; Background

Column.Name: CH2B_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature background intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel; Background

Column.Name: CH1D_MEAN
Column.Description: The mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel

Column.Name: CH2D_MEAN
Column.Description: .The mean feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: CH1I_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2I_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1B_MEAN
Column.Description: The mean feature background intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Background

Column.Name: CH2B_MEAN
Column.Description: The mean feature background intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Background

Column.Name: CH1D_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 532 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2D_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1_PER_SAT
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels at wavelength 532 nm that are saturated.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2_PER_SAT
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels at wavelength 635 nm that are saturated.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH1I_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel

Column.Name: CH2I_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature pixel intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: CH1B_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature background intensity at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy3 Channel; Background

Column.Name: CH2B_SD
Column.Description: The standard deviation of the feature background intensity at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel; Background

Column.Name: PERGTBCH1I_1SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than one standard deviation above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PERGTBCH2I_1SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than one standard deviation above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 635 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PERGTBCH1I_2SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than two standard deviations above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PERGTBCH2I_2SD
Column.Description: The percentage of feature pixels with intensities more than two standard deviations above the background pixel intensity, at wavelength 532 nm.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: SUM_MEAN
Column.Description: The sum of the arithmetic mean intensities for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: SUM_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The sum of the median intensities for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT1_MEAN
Column.Description: Ratio of the arithmetic mean intensities of each spot for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted. Channel 1/Channel 2 ratio, (CH1I_MEAN - CH1B_MEDIAN)/(CH2I_MEAN - CH2B_MEDIAN) or Green/Red ratio.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2_MEAN
Column.Description: The ratio of the arithmetic mean intensities of each feature for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The ratio of the median intensities of each feature for each wavelength, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PIX_RAT2_MEAN
Column.Description: The geometric mean of the pixel-by-pixel ratios of pixel intensities, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: PIX_RAT2_MEDIAN
Column.Description: The median of pixel-by-pixel ratios of pixel intensities, with the median background subtracted.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2_SD
Column.Description: The geometric standard deviation of the pixel intensity ratios.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: TOT_SPIX
Column.Description: The total number of feature pixels.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: TOT_BPIX
Column.Description: The total number of background pixels.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: REGR
Column.Description: The regression ratio of every pixel in a 2-feature-diameter circle around the center of the feature.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CORR
Column.Description: The correlation between channel1 (Cy3) & Channel 2 (Cy5) pixels within the spot, and is a useful quality control parameter. Generally, high values imply better fit & good spot quality.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: DIAMETER
Column.Description: The diameter in um of the feature-indicator.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: X_COORD
Column.Description: X-coordinate of the center of the spot-indicator associated with the spot, where (0,0) is the top left of the image.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: Y_COORD
Column.Description: Y-coordinate of the center of the spot-indicator associated with the spot, where (0,0) is the top left of the image.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: TOP
Column.Description: Box top: int(((centerX - radius) - Xoffset) / pixelSize).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: BOT
Column.Description: Box bottom: int(((centerX + radius) - Xoffset) / pixelSize).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: LEFT
Column.Description: Box left: int(((centerY - radius) - yoffset) / pixelSize).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RIGHT
Column.Description: Box right: int(((centerY + radius) - yoffset) / pixelSize); Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: FLAG
Column.Description: The type of flag associated with a feature: -100 = user-flagged null spot; -50 = software-flagged null spot; 0 = spot valid.; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2IN_MEAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of mean Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity (CH2I_MEAN/Normalization factor).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: CH2BN_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of median Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) background (CH2B_MEDIAN/Normalization factor).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel; Background

Column.Name: CH2DN_MEAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of mean Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity with normalized background subtracted (CH2IN_MEAN - CH2BN_MEDIAN).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale; Channel: Cy5 channel

Column.Name: RAT2N_MEAN
Column.Description: Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2IN_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of median Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity (CH2I_MEDIAN/Normalization factor).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: CH2DN_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Normalized value of median Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity with normalized background subtracted (CH2IN_MEDIAN - CH2BN_MEDIAN).; Type: integer; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT1N_MEAN
Column.Description: Ratio of the means of Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) intensity to normalized Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) intensity with median background subtracted (CH1D_MEAN/CH2DN_MEAN). Channel 1/Channel 2 ratio normalized or Green/Red ratio normalized.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: RAT2N_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Channel 2/Channel 1 ratio normalized, RAT2_MEDIAN/Normalization factor or Red/Green median ratio normalized.; Type: float; Scale: linear_scale

Column.Name: LOG_RAT2N_MEAN
Column.Description: Log (base 2) of the ratio of the mean of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) [log (base 2) (RAT2N_MEAN)].; Type: float; Scale: log_base_2

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Log (base 2) of the ratio of the median of Channel 2 (usually 635 nm) to Channel 1 (usually 532 nm) [log (base 2) (RAT2N_MEDIAN)].; Type: float; Scale: log_base_2

Series.Title: DpiA overexpression
Series.Summary: The dpiA and dpiB genes of Escherichia coli, which are orthologs of genes that regulate citrate uptake and utilization in Klebsiella pneumoniae, comprise a two-component signal transduction system that can modulate the replication of and destabilize the inheritance of pSC101 and certain other plasmids. Here we show that perturbed replication and inheritance result from binding of the effector protein DpiA to A+T-rich replication origin sequences that resemble those in the K. pneumoniae promoter region targeted by the DpiA ortholog, CitB. Consistent with its ability to bind to A+T-rich origin sequences, overproduction of DpiA induced the SOS response in E. coli, suggesting that chromosomal DNA replication is affected. Bacteria that overexpressed DpiA showed an increased amount of DNA per cell and increased cell size-both also characteristic of the SOS response. Concurrent overexpression of the DNA replication initiation protein, DnaA, or the DNA helicase, DnaB-both of which act at A+T-rich replication origin sequences in the E. coli chromosome and DpiA-targeted plasmids-reversed SOS induction as well as plasmid destabilization by DpiA. Our finding that physical and functional interactions between DpiA and sites of replication initiation modulate DNA replication and plasmid inheritance suggests a mechanism by which environmental stimuli transmitted by these gene products can regulate chromosomal and plasmid dynamics. Set of arrays organized by shared biological context, such as organism, tumors types, processes, etc. Keywords: Logical Set
